channel.title: Integrating Forums/Website/Server
channel.description:
I would like to know how you guys think of the idea if you link all of the 3 together so you have 1 account that is linked to all the main areas like Forums website and the server. I was told it creates lagg every now and then when playing, but also reduces the amount of spam accounts created.
I have the stuff to do it on IPB still wondering if I should go through with it.

item.title: Integrating Forums/Website/Server
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

Muroth:

the only reason you’d have major lag is if you have a horrible host, but as jmood and nike said, just do it

I see I guess I will do it. I found one on vbulletin so i’m just switching some of the code around so it will work with IPB.

Read full topic
